This might be one of the more important articles written this year. This topic has needed a high profile in-depth survey of events for some time now. Howard W. French and The Atlantic are to be commended.
a Filipino...former admiral and national-security adviser...[asked] “Do you think it is natural for a superpower to behave the way China is?”
China's lack of diplomacy and soft power will prove to be its greatest weakness in any global contest of influence.
